Name: Islets
Desc: Take to the sky and reunite a fragmented world in this surprisingly wholesome metroidvania! Help Iko adventure across beautiful hand-painted islands, receive letters from a quirky cast of characters, and face powerful monstrous adversaries.

Name: Thief
Desc: Thief is a 1st person stealth-action game by Eidos-Montréal. In this reimagination of the cult classic Thief franchise, steal, stealth and infiltrate your way through the treacherous City as Garrett, the Master Thief.

Name: 失落城堡: 遺跡守護者
Desc: “遺跡的守護者” DLC中包含了兩張全新的地圖等你來挑戰！
